lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everybody, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe even to raise some money for our own Critical Role Foundation and their awesome 826LA fundraising push! (gasping)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That actually, we do not want to be associated with whatever it is that you're about to do.

lines.text: Let's start the bidding at 10 dollars! Anyone? 10 dollars? 10? Do I hear 10? Do I see 10? No bidders? No bidders? What if I told you this bag does not only contain hair from my head?

lines.text: What? It's for the Critical Role Foundation.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, no, it's not! CRF, we just-- We don't want anything to do with whatever the hell it is that you're doing.

lines.text: What? It'll look good on the Playa, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually a great point. 200 dollars?

lines.text: Hey, we live together, we can totally share.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One bite guard, slightly used, to prevent you from grinding your teeth.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Is that a prop from one of your skits?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I hear 50 dollars? 50 dollars, everybody!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you even get into our house?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was, it was! 50 dollars anyone? Do I hear 50?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Over here, I'd like to have that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ew, why? That's my bite guard!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not any more its not! Sold to the 30,000-year old man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why do you even want that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, all this money tonight is going straight to the Critical Role Foundation.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will sue your ass, Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back to you, Matt! Thanks, Fandom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, our Vox Machina Origins series three, issue number two, is now available at local comic shops, as well as online digital platforms like Dark Horse Digital and ComiXology.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fantastic, I'm super excited you guys get to continue the story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ♪ I want today ♪ All right, Ashley, by the way, since you spoke up, you have an announcement!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, you had some quick announcements to make?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's of the Darrington Brigade! It's like, you know,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they might already be gone! I don't know! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, I believe our announcements come to an end which means it's time for us to jump into tonight's episode of--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah! (water bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion booming) ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're about to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role (roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Critical Role (roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn (your turn, your turn) ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now, as you all begin to drift downward into the dark lightless expanse, the first order of business, who cast Fly? You? Essek, and you with your sword,

lines.text: Oh no, you just got your hair back!

lines.text: Is there light? Did you globules?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as your feet touch, you can see it dividing amongst your ankles and beginning to feel a little bit of tension from it, pushing past you, but not too strongly.

lines.text: I'm going to hover just above.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As if it were a harmless solid." So I would say no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it is going quickly and you freak out for just a second, but your footing is still pretty solid as it just passes beneath you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the temperature of the water?

lines.text: Do you reach down into it?

lines.text: And that currently appears to be the only place from this particular platform that you could head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And water's pouring down from the hallway.

lines.text: Correct, and as you look ahead, you could see it like cascading down the stairs.

lines.text: Any writing? Does it look-- any-- Once again, any signs or anything over the gateway?

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the same? Can you see better? Do you feel like you can see? The darkness or something else? Veth?

lines.text: You see Sprinkle slowly emerge from around her neck and look up with the eyes and-- The glance over of the weasel and go, (as Artagan) "Well, how else was I supposed to stay with you--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you've just been here the whole time?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I told you I'd be keeping an eye."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course he is! That makes perfect sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the only reason he's still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're not entirely wrong, and it's been a journey."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was a giant chimp, but then I saw it again, and then I started to-- But I wasn't sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weren't as close a proximity during.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could have done that before.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or if it's pretty fresh? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, you do see signs of erosion, long-term erosion.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As old as any of the other bodies you've seen in Aeor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The exposed portions of them that are up on the debris are as decayed as they can be, but they're not as mummified because of the proximity of the moisture and the elements that were in the water are grody and black and mostly remnants of heavily corroded bone and material.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Frigid Depths do surround Eiselcross, but there is a mountain range between the edges of the ocean and the ruins where you currently are.

lines.text: I mean, is it-- It's so far, unless we're--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very weird, especially for water to be moving down.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like in Rumblecusp, there could be a breach.

lines.text: We're looking for the Immensus Gate, but yes.

lines.text: Instead of the Astral Sea, there's a water plane, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There'd be a huge depression, or something.

lines.text: I don't know what there'd be.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: (coughing bark) (growls and barks) This distant growling bark sound, way above, it seems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like back from whence we came up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From above, but because of the space and the openness of this area, you're not quite certain of the direction, plus the fact that you're inside a little bit from where the ledge is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's outside of the cave we're currently in, but above.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Maybe it's Devexian is fighting with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it sound like a tussle, or did it sound like when, you know, the coyotes at night are just talking to each other?

lines.text: You do not have any experience with the creature that makes that sound, and you've never really heard it before, other than maybe some of the combat sounds of some of the creatures you encountered here in Aeor, so you're-- Make an insight check with disadvantage.

lines.text: We'd be ahead of them already? They would've seen us go whoosh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He can't fly. We talked about that last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, but they could see us drop down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right, we might've gotten in front of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, rolled a 12, and I have a plus nine on my insight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds like a call to hunt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ran out at that scene.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, that's exactly what it sounded like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have any way of sealing off this cave, do we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, let me see what I have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the doorway made of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord can shape the water into some sort of ice wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hall that you're in right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then the stairs that go up into the hall above looks to be about 15, 20 feet from side to side, and about 10 feet tall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Might be a way to block it off, if need be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much stone can you move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could maybe pull one side of that doorway to the halfway point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do five feet in any dimension, so I could probably close off a door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I could close it off maybe entirely, but it takes me a while to do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you put up your wire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That might be the best, save your spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be cool to hide something, like something that will hurt them in the water, in the doorway, maybe, where we know they have to pass through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't see it because it's underwater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have the glyph anymore? The glyph's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't prepare it today because I used it already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that certainly makes it easier to choose."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we put a wire and move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do it, but, again, it's a time suck since it's not prepared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we'll find another opportunity for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, if you all are moving quietly, I'd like the whole group to make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think my Fly has probably petered out after all that discussion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Blessing of the Trickster so you get advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage on-- Sorry, I already gave it to Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't count after you've already rolled anyway, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm flying, do I need to roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ Splish, splash, I was taking a bath ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you all carefully progress, gently (water splashing) through the water as you begin to ascend the stairs, can I get a marching order as you step into the hallway? There's enough room for you to travel by tightly, you know, somewhat, four at a time, or you can do three comfortably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be up there with Beau as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I be able to tell that we're splashing a lot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just trying to be quiet before it breaks the surface every time, and-- (water splashing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could cast Pass Without a Trace, but we've already rolled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, why don't you join us in the front?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll come up to the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Jester, and Beau, and Fjord are in front?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who's in the next wave?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be in the center of the pod.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go on Caleb's other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, with Veth and Essek taking up the rear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do what needs to be done.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (water splashing) It continues on for about 30, 35 or so feet before a door, a closed door greets you on the right hand side, and it continues on, and you can see it taking a left about 25 or so feet ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, door to the south, turn toward the north if it's going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: West, so it would be, door to the north, and then it turns to the south.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means the door would be on the north.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, use the key cards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real quick, is there a covering of dust, anything that looks like it's been disturbed, or wiped, or touched recently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but, you know, as you're glancing around, you can see, the bottom of the walls, and the bottom of the door, everything here has, like, a slight blackish tint to it from just years and years of perpetual corrosion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is script above the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 1st-level spell, yeah, I will take out my little pinch of salt and soot, and drop it in front of my eyes, and cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think we could have a feast out here in the sea?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very "Alice in Wonderland", trying to to set up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When the door closes, what is in its place? Just a door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you now find yourselves free floating through the Astral Sea. You take stock of everyone, including the sheep, and look back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome," "Welcome," "Welcome," "Welcome." "Welcome." And that's where we'll end tonight's episode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh boy, they just got themselves a sheep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are wool-fully unprepared for this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I'm bleating out of all the places.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter) That's why-- Because I was like, I don't want any of you guys to have to peel me off the ground, so I was like, I'm going to go through the portal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was like, I could go out of here cool and dead, or alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing is holding me and I have no strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you've made it to Cognouza.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see what lies in store for you next time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't wait to go shopping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have any healing potions? (retches)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
